Detailed Description

Fly3D plugin DLL class.

This class holds information for each Fly3D plugin DLL, including the number of classes implemented in the DLL, and the pointers to the DLL exported functions.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
